ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No indeed! The truth is they do not fear the Next World.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: By no means. In fact they do not fear the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: No indeed; the truth is that they have no fear of the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This will certainly never be the case! In fact, they are not afraid of the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Never! In fact they do not fear the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! But they fear not the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! but they do not fear the hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No indeed; but they do not fear the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, verily. They fear not the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: No! They do not fear the Hereafter --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By no means! Aye, they fear not the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No! Indeed, they do not fear the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By no means! But they fear not the Hereafter,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay! But they fear not the Hereafter (from Allah's punishment).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No, indeed they have no fear of the Everlasting Life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: No indeed! But they do not fear the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:53] No indeed! (kallā: a deterrent of what they desire). Rather they do not fear the Hereafter, that is, the chastisement thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, verily) he will not be given this. (They fear not the Hereafter) they do not fear the torment of the Hereafter.
